mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.status, o.timestamp, c.customer_id, c.phone, c.email, c.address, r.restaurant_id, r.restaurant_name AS restaurant_name, r.address AS restaurant_address, r.status AS restaurant_status, u.courier_id, u.phone AS courier_phone, u.status AS courier_status, u.coordinates AS courier_coordinates, i.order_item_id, i.price AS order_item_price, i.quantity AS order_item_quantity, m.restaurant_menu_item_id, m.name AS restaurant_menu_item_name, m.price AS restaurant_menu_item_price, m.description AS restaurant_menu_item_description, m.image AS restaurant_menu_item_image, m.status AS restaurant_menu_item_status FROM public.orders o JOIN public.customer c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN public.restaurant r ON o.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id LEFT JOIN public.courier u ON o.courier_id = u.courier_id LEFT JOIN public.order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id LEFT JOIN public.restaurant_menu_item m ON i.restaurant_menu_item_id = m.restaurant_menu_item_id WHERE o.order_id = #{id}
